"Set whether the radar will rotate
to follow the camera's orientation."

"Enable or disable the video playback
in-game (such as on the monitors in the ARKS Lobby).
※Requires a restart to take effect."
"If enabled, offensive language will not be displayed in-game."

"Select how lock-on functions.
Determine whether to lock on by
clicking the button once, or holding the button."

"Sets how to switch the palette.

Select to toggle switching only while holding the button."

"You can set the interval for the avoidance action
using ([W]/[A]/[S]/[D]) movement keys on the keyboard."

"Set whether to save the party settings,
even after logging out and changing blocks.
The party setting will be saved until you exit the game."
"Determines if the lock-on target will be changed using <%RStick>."

"You can set whether or not to show the ARKS Road
Navigation icon, indicating your next goal."
"Set whether or not to draw attention to events by prompting you to hold <%Access>."
"Set whether or not to automatically pick up Meseta when it is nearby."
"Select whether to show other party's names as dark blue or white"

"The color displayed of the HP bar when
hit with Strike, Ranged or Tech damage."

"Set the default party name
(if no party name is set)."

"Autoselects beginner blocks or random
blocks when using a Lv.20↓ character."
"Choose whether to display selected Subpalette entry."

"Select the rarity at which rare drop notifications
will appear upon a rare item dropping."

"When 13★ or higher items drop, this setting
will deposit them directly to your inventory instead
of in the field to protect against forgotten drops."

"Set the initial cursor position when the storage
UI is displayed. Applies to opening storage, to
putting items up for sale in your My Shop and to
buying and selling items at NPC shops."
"Configure pet HP bar and status icon appearance."

"While the radar map is magnified,
you can change the temporary magnification
settings when an E-trial occurs."
"During Dark Blast, you can set a dedicated voice."

"Set what the cursor's default position is when
choosing between same-block and multi-block matching.
※Some Quests are excluded"

"Changes how the Character Menu is
displayed when selecting others."
"Set whether to display simple Gathering information on the main menu. "

"Set whether or not to display an icon for players in need of revival.
\u3000※You can still receive bonuses even if the icon is not displayed"

"Set whether to log a notification

"Set whether to display the Recommended Orders

"Configure whether or not a notification is displayed

"Set whether to display a notification at login when

"Enable or disable the confirmation window

"Set whether to offer to repair important

"When using the mouse, choose whether to prioritize

"Set whether to quote mail in replies."

"Set whether to show the interface

"Select what content to display in the log window's \"View All\" tab."

"Turn off the ability for the Scroll Lock key to toggle direct chat.

"Change how Group Chat Balloons are displayed."
"Select whether to show or hide symbol arts."

"When you log in,

"Sets the background color of the chat
that corresponds to who you're talking to."

"Choose whether to display indicators
for incapacitated party members.

"Choose whether to allow other players to
see an indicator if you are incapacitated.

you will not receive the indicator."
"Set whether to receive Group Chat invites."
"Set whether to display the Player ID name or the Character name in Group Chat, Team Chat and Whispers."

"This will reset all windows to their initial positions and default sizes.

"This will reset the size and location of all windows."
